Hello again.

I'm Alex, a designer and creative director. I partner with teams and founders to strategize and design products, brands, and systems that yield balanced societal, environmental, and business value. I'm happiest working end-to-end, from broad strategic thinking through technical craftsmanship inside of nimble, diverse teams. I prefer my organizations ethical, my code open source, and my wheels airborne.
